EmailTemplate.name: 18-02 CS Sales Support to Partners
EmailTemplate.subject: Resources to Support Your Community Solar Sales
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We want to make Community Solar an easy sell.
Now that you've achieved Loyal Blue status with BlueWave, we want to support you as you unlock the benefits of selling Community Solar shares.
To support your sales team, please follow the checklist below to maximize the benefit of our solar partnership!
BlueWave's Resource Checklist:
Shared Collateral Library: Access a library of collateral for your customers including brochures, a contract overview, high-res project photos, an intro video, social media content suggestions, and more! Co-Branding: We are happy to co-brand any of our customer collateral for your needs, simply email your logo file to our Marketing Team. Training Guide: You can always reference the guide BlueWave provided during training. Plus, we can set up following up training as needed with your team. Launch Events: Let's discuss co-branded launch events with your team. Field Support: We know that selling Community Solar is new to you, so please let us know if you'd like us to support your early sales by joining you in the field to answer customer questions!
Have you completed your Community Solar checklist yet?
Do you have other Community Solar sales needs we can support?
Send us an Email!
Thank you for working with BlueWave to provide Solar for Everyone, Everywhere!
- All of us here at BlueWave
